title: Mystic Robe
summaries: The Mystic Robe (Gypsy Robe on [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader) is an armor item that can be worn in the shirt slot. It provides minimal defense (2) but a 6% damage and critical strike boost to magic weapons, along with a 10% reduction in mana use. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 350 / 2 .

Wearing the Wizard Hat alongside the robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance, while wearing a Magic Hat alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 Mana. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses intact.
